title.rendered: MásMóvil completes the migration of Euskaltel, R and Virgin Telco to its mobile network

content.rendered:
Starting today, customers of the Euskaltel Group (Euskaltel, R and Virgin Telco)are already part of the MásMóvil mobile network.

Euskaltel joins the MásMóvil network

The MásMóvil Group has completed the migration to its mobile telephone network of the more than 1.2 million private customers of the Euskaltel Group in Euskadi, Galicia and the rest of Spain. The Meinrad Spenger group will now provide its mobile phone network as an alternative for these customers.

In addition to providing a greater number of alternatives to these customers, the yellow operator also states that 50% of the customers of some of the Euskaltel Group companies will significantly improve their coverage in numerous municipalities on the Cantabrian coast.

«As a result of this migration process, carried out in record time, Euskaltel, R and Virgin telco mobile customers now have access to the most complete network coverage on the market, since they will be able to use both the Group as the network of other operators with whom we have closed agreements for the benefit of our customers. Today, more than 50% of our customers have seen their mobile coverage improve, and it positions us as leaders in the sector since we have the lowest rate of time without coverage in the entire market”, highlights Norberto Ojinaga, Network Director of the Group Euskaltel.

Last December, MásMóvil announced that it had already migrated one million customers to Yoigo’s coverage, but this time it is about their complete migration.

Choice of mobile network

MásMóvil also highlighted at the time when the friendly takeover bid was confirmed that the jump to the new coverage will include an automatic selection service that will guarantee migrated customers the best coverage available at all times, provided they are in areas where both Orange and Yoigo had direct coverage. This will make even more sense in the near future, since it must be remembered that in the future there will be a merger between MásMóvil and Orange.

Map Euskaltel Virgin R

“We are very happy to be able to offer our customers tangible benefits in a very short time. From now on, our Euskaltel, R and Virgin telco mobile customers will benefit from a powerful and improved network coverage by using the Group’s own network and our agreements with third parties. Our commitment is to accelerate access to the best infrastructures available to our customers wherever they are”, said Meinrad Spenger, CEO of Euskaltel and the MásMóvil Group.
